summary.para: Contains classes and interfaces that allow you to configure your ASP.NET Core Blazor application in the fluent API-based application builder.
Extends the interface with a method to add the Dashboards Module to your application.
Adds the Dashboards Module to your application.

member.param: Allows you to register and configure Modules in your application, and chain further Module registrations.
Options that you can use to configure the Dashboards Module.
member.returns: Allows you to register and configure Modules in your application, and chain further Module registrations.

summary.para: Contains classes for the Blazor-specific Dashboards Module.
Contains components that the Blazor-specific Dashboards Module uses to display dashboards in the UI.
A View Item that displays the component.
